General.Name: Fast Food Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Fast Food Indonesia Tbk engages in the food and restaurant business in Indonesia. It holds the rights to establish and operate Kentucky Fried Chicken outlets. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Let. Jend. M. T. Haryono Kav. 7, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12810

AddressData.Street: Jl. Let. Jend. M. T. Haryono Kav. 7
